metadata.title: ELSA-2019-2135:  qt5 security, bug fix, and enhancement update (MODERATE)
metadata.description:
qt5-qt3d
[5.9.7-1]
- Update to 5.9.7
  Resolves: bz#1564024

qt5-qtbase
[5.9.7-1]
- Enable -doc subpkg on PPC
  Resolves: bz#1564000

[5.9.7-1]
- Update to 5.9.7
  Resolves: bz#1564000
